resources.string:
To get started, start cmus using 
"cmus with --listen 0.0.0.0"
Then set a password using 
":passwd=yourpass"
Now add your cmus host details to the settings in this app and hit okay.

This app is a fork of the seriousben's cmus-droid-remote on github. The source for this app can be found at
https://github.com/jatwigg/cmus-droid-remote

The awesome icons are by www.icons4android.com.

This is a work in progress, please report any problems.
